jinngine.collision
Class GJK.State

java.lang.Object
  jinngine.collision.GJK.State
Enclosing class:
GJK
public final class GJK.State
extends java.lang.Object

A state structure for the GJK3 implementation. Used internally in the GJK3 implementation, and also used to simplify caching of GJK results.

Author:
Silcowitz
